title: Get in touch
subtitle: Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.

form.name: Name
form.sentMessage: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Simply sign up for a free account, claim your username, and start customizing your bio page.

items.question: Can I use a custom domain?
items.answer: Yes! Custom domains are available on our Standard and Pro plans.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express.

items.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your dashboard settings.
